content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position (61.0, -52.0) and (63.0, -52.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (61.0, -52.0) and Furnace at position (63.0, -52.0)
- Both furnaces are connected to a supply of copper ore, with the furnace at (61.0, -52.0) having a fuel source of coal and currently producing copper plates.

### Copper ore mine at position (-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-28.5, -61.5) which is extracting copper ore.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is not full before inserting items. The current logs indicate that the furnaces at positions (61.0, -52.0) and (63.0, -52.0) are full, which prevents further insertion.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
